traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

traits.name: Inspire Lizardfolk
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the lizardfolk targets an ally it can see within 30 feet that can see and hear the lizardfolk. The target gains 2d6 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

actions.name: Blackjaw Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage and 2 (1d4) fire damage

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
